pages.text: $(o)"The Thread was woven out of itself, a concept known to all Thoughts there are. The Thread, however, decided to do more out of itself. With its own power, it constantly weaves the field of magic and souls, till that will destroy it, let it be for an eternity."$()

pages.title: Symbol
pages.text: This symbol is created with $(l:vitalis/entry_protoplasm)Protoplasm$() in the $(l:glory/entry_rite_glorious)Glorious Rite$().$(br)The symbol can be linked to an altar, and will supply the $(marked)Mana$() aspect.
